channel.title: Add a Game Breakdown after game is over
channel.description:
Hi, very new player here,
Could you implement a system that shows what happened every night after the game is over?
Such as:
Night 1: Fred (Knight) killed Bob (Knight) Day 2: John (Court Wizard) was executed for Treason Night 2: Tom (Alchemist) was Bled by Rob (Hunter)
ETC, it would help understand what happened during the game for a new player, thanks.

item.title: Add a Game Breakdown after game is over

item.description:
Yeah, but i like it too!

Read full topic
